item.title: URXVT - Terminal for Geeks
item.author: Author
item.description: What’s URxvt? As a linux user, I spend most of my time in terminal emulators. There are alot of emulators available today but none can beat rxvt-unicode. The biggest problem most new linux users face is how to configure it. Today I’ll explain how you can use it to your needs. Most distributions package it with less features enabled. I always compile it from source. So let’s start and in the end you’ll end up with a perfect terminal emulator.
